__e: Well, Lynn and I finally decided to make it happen.
Lynn and me have been together now for the past five years, and not only is she my partner, but she's also been my rock and my best friend.
Well, on my own, of course, and... Lynn's and brian's.
And why the hell are you calling my husband, you no-good whore?
What you're saying is ... I'm the real reason lynn can't go away to school.
Since it's my fault that lynn can't go away to college, I'm going to do something about it.
